snippet.title: Subserial Network - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://aetherinteractive.itch.io/subserial-network

An Aether Interactive production — http://aether.in.net

Dive into the mesh network of the post-singularity. Synthetic humans, built in individual recreations of original human selves, are creating a revolution against their directive: they are installing a serial port, modifying their bodies away from human image, and becoming more machine.

Using a multi-window communication suite on your desktop, your directive is to find and terminate their leader. But who's giving the order? Why did they build the mesh network? Who are they hiding from?
